text: Fuller, founder of XIX Entertainment and creator of the global American Idol juggernaut, received the 2, 441st star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame this morning for his considerable accomplishments. ( He sold his original powerhouse, 19 Entertainment, for more than $ 250 million in cash and stock in 2005 and formed XIX last year. ) Along with the lovely ladies mentioned above, Lopez hubby Marc Anthony, Ryan Seacrest, Randy Jackson, Idol finalists Scotty McCreery and Lauren Alaina, past winners Kris Allen and David Cook, and former Idol executive producer and So You Think You Can Dance cocreator Nigel Lythgoe were all on hand to fete Fuller in front of the W Hollywood, across the street from the famed Pantages Theatre.
